sense.name: 孩子, child, children
sense.commentary: Aperson from the time of birth until he or she is fully grown, or a son or daughter of any age.
sense.examples:
他有一个孩子。 He has one child.
他们的孩子五岁。 Their child is five.
她有两个孩子。 She has two children.

sense.name: 孩子, 财富(用复数表财富), children
sense.commentary: 孩子, 财富(用复数表财富), children=asset, something having value.
sense.examples:
他们是祖国的孩子。 They are sons and daughters of our country.
他门是我们祖国的孩子(财富)。 They are our country's children.
